DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of the study is to evaluate the therapeutic benefit and safety of intratympanic AM-101 injections in comparison to placebo in the treatment of persistent acute inner ear tinnitus.
DOC.brief_title: Comparison of Single Versus Repeat Doses of AM-101 in the Treatment of Acute Inner Ear Tinnitus
DOC.criteria: Tinnitus following acute acoustic trauma, acute otitis media, middle ear surgery or inner ear barotrauma; with onset less than three months ago. Tinnitus that is not completely maskable Fluctuating tinnitus Intermittent tinnitus Meniere's Disease Ongoing acute or chronic otitis media or otitis externa.
